snippet: Underdog Tony Bellew stopped former WBA heavyweight champion David Haye in the 11th round of their thrilling clash at London's O2 Arena on Saturday....

headline.main: After Bombs, Pakistan Tightens Security for Rare Major Cricket Match
headline.print_headline: After Bombs, Pakistan Tightens Security for Rare Major Cricket Match

lead_paragraph: Underdog Tony Bellew stopped former WBA heavyweight champion David Haye in the 11th round of their thrilling clash at London's O2 Arena on Saturday.
